mapper.select: SELECT CH_NO , CH_TITLE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CH_START_DAY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CH_END_DAY , MEMBER_ID , (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY CA WHERE CA.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) CATEGORY_NAME , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_CHA_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO) FILE_PATH FROM TB_CHALLENGE C WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CH_NO DESC

SELECT CH_NO , CH_TITLE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CH_START_DAY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CH_END_DAY , MEMBER_ID , CATEGORY_NO , (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY CA WHERE CA.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) CATEGORY_NAME , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_CHA_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO) FILE_PATH , CH_CONTENT FROM TB_CHALLENGE C WHERE CH_NO = #{chNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
